Return Window

We offer a 14-day return window from the date of delivery for standard items in original condition.

What Can Be Returned

Eligible for Return:
• Standard products in original condition
• Unused items with original packaging
• Items returned within 14 days of delivery

Not Eligible for Return:
• Custom or personalised items
• Items damaged by customer use
• Items returned after 14-day window

Return Process

Step 1: Contact us at hello@yourstore.com with your order number
Step 2: We'll provide return authorization and instructions
Step 3: Package item securely with original packaging
Step 4: Send via tracked service (customer covers return shipping)

Refund Processing

Once we receive and inspect your returned item:

  • Refund processed within 3-5 working days
  • Refund issued to original payment method
  • Original shipping costs are non-refundable
  • Return shipping costs covered by customer

Damaged or Faulty Items

If you receive a damaged or faulty item:

  • Contact us within 48 hours with photos
  • We'll arrange free return collection
  • Full refund or replacement provided
  • No questions asked!

Exchanges

We don't offer direct exchanges. Please return your item for a refund and place a new order for the desired item.

Cancellations

Standard Orders: Can be cancelled within 24 hours of placing order
Custom Orders: Cannot be cancelled once production begins

Contact Us

Questions about returns? Email us at hello@yourstore.com - we're here to help make it right!
